diagrams.description: A flowchart showing the fundamental concepts and structure of Philosophy of Law.
diagrams.mermaid_code:
flowchart TD
    PhilosophyofLaw[Philosophy of Law] --> Field1[Philosophy]
    PhilosophyofLaw --> Field2[Law]
    PhilosophyofLaw --> Integration[Integration Areas]
    philosophy --> philosophySub1[Theory]
    philosophy --> philosophySub2[Practice]
    law --> lawSub1[Theory]
    law --> lawSub2[Practice]
    Integration --> Methods[Research Methods]
    Integration --> Applications[Applications]
